Sql.query: insert into cai_sddp_parametro( sddppmcodi, caiajcodi, sddppmtc, sddppmsemini, sddppmnumsem, sddppmcantbloque, sddppmnumserie, sddppmusucreacion, sddppmfeccreacion ) values( :sddppmcodi, :caiajcodi, :sddppmtc, :sddppmsemini, :sddppmnumsem, :sddppmcantbloque, :sddppmnumserie, :sddppmusucreacion, :sddppmfeccreacion )

update cai_sddp_parametro set caiajcodi = :caiajcodi, sddppmtc = :sddppmtc, sddppmsemini = :sddppmsemini, sddppmnumsem = :sddppmnumsem, sddppmcantbloque = :sddppmcantbloque, sddppmnumserie = :sddppmnumserie, sddppmusucreacion = :sddppmusucreacion, sddppmfeccreacion = :sddppmfeccreacion where sddppmcodi = :sddppmcodi
select sddppmcodi, caiajcodi, sddppmtc, sddppmsemini, sddppmnumsem, sddppmcantbloque, sddppmnumserie, sddppmusucreacion, sddppmfeccreacion from cai_sddp_parametro
select sddppmcodi, caiajcodi, sddppmtc, sddppmsemini, sddppmnumsem, sddppmcantbloque, sddppmnumserie, sddppmusucreacion, sddppmfeccreacion from cai_sddp_parametro
